sesp

Spatially Explicit Stratified Power Model

Installation

  • Install development binary version from R-universe with:
install.packages('sesp',
                 repos = c("https://stscl.r-universe.dev",
                           "https://cloud.r-project.org"),
                 dep = TRUE)
  • Install development source version from GitHub with:
if (!requireNamespace("devtools")) {
    install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("stscl/sesp",
                         build_vignettes = TRUE,
                         dep = TRUE)
